Our Service

Our BLINC platform is a one stop learning portal, with a simple student teacher dashboard accessible anywhere in the world as well as providing an easy administration of your school via the application.

Learning Management System

Full range of Learning management Tool, suitable for any learning institution. Built-in Social media; Forum, File Sharing, eBook, Project Work, etc.

Manage Fees, Donations. Track income and expenses. Manage Staffing and Payrolls, Manage Hostel, Transport, Track all Payments and Defaulters

Marketplace

We provide the platform for publishers of books recommended for schools in Nigeria can upload text and workbooks for sale.

About Us

BLINC helps schools manage the business of education, teach students virtually and track students and teachers progress in a single platform.

A secured and cost effective cloud based platform customized to suit your school requirements.

Our Mission

Our mission is to make collaboration between school administration and other stakeholders (parents, students, staff and publishers) within and outside educational environment seamless.

Our Vision

Our vision is to make collaboration between school administration and other stakeholders (parents, students, staff and publishers) within and outside educational environment seamless.
